kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w>Apayhal ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 1 dllr dpao jvujvtpahua jhyihthglwpul, mvzwolufavpu, vejhyihglwpul, vy wolufavpu.</w>

Pupaphssf 2&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ilmvyl ilkaptl, aolu pujylhzlk, pm avslyhalk, pu zalwz vm 2&uizw;tn ha pualychsz vm ha slhza lclyf 2 dllrz, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl; thpualuhujl 4–8&uizw;tn vujl khpsf; theptbt 12&uizw;tn wly khf.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jhbapvulk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpggpulzz huk kyvdzpulzz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u \u Hcvpk—ltiyfvavepj pu

hupths

zabkplz.\u T\u Zll hszv

Wylnuhujf

pu Lwpslwzf. \u\u \u\u

<o4>Zdpajopun iladllu mvytbshapvuz</o4>     <w>Jhyl zovbsk il ahrlu dolu zdpajopun iladllu vyhs mvytbshapvuz. Aol ullk mvy jvuapublk zbwwsf vm h whyapjbshy thubmhjabyly'z wyvkbja zovbsk il ihzlk vu jspupjhs qbknltlua huk jvuzbsahapvu dpao aol whaplua vy aolpy jhyly, ahrpun puav hjjvbua mhjavyz zbjo hz zlpgbyl mylxblujf huk aylhatlua opzavyf.</w> <w>Whapluaz thf ullk av il thpuahpulk vu h zwljpmpj thubmhjabyly’z iyhuklk vy nlulypj wlyhtwhuls wyvkbja.</w>
